personalProjects.name: Professional Portfolio Website
personalProjects.description: Modern, responsive portfolio website built with React showcasing professional experience, technical skills, and projects. Features dynamic content management, smooth animations, and optimized performance with comprehensive project documentation.
personalProjects.highlights: Professional showcase demonstrating frontend development expertise and attention to design details

personalProjects.name: Wedding Invitation Platform
personalProjects.description: A modern web platform for creating and managing digital wedding invitations with Firebase backend integration. Features real-time RSVP management, guest list tracking, and responsive design.
personalProjects.highlights: Demonstrates full-stack development skills with real-time data management

personalProjects.name: Learning Journal Platform
personalProjects.description: Personal learning management platform with Firebase hosting and build automation. Features content management and progress tracking for continuous learning documentation.
personalProjects.highlights: Shows commitment to continuous learning and documentation practices

personalProjects.name: Workflow Automation Tools
personalProjects.description: Collection of automation tools and scripts designed to streamline development workflows and improve productivity. Features various utility scripts and automation helpers.
personalProjects.highlights: Demonstrates automation skills and focus on developer productivity

personalProjects.name: Melate Retro Statistical Analyzer
personalProjects.description: Advanced statistical analysis system for Melate Retro lottery with automated data collection, pattern recognition, and AI-powered predictions. Features complete automation with GitHub Actions and Firebase integration.
features: Automated web scraping for lottery results
personalProjects.highlights: Sophisticated data analysis system with complete automation and AI-powered insights

personalProjects.name: Vending Machine Sales Tracker
personalProjects.description: Comprehensive sales tracking and analytics platform for vending machines with real-time data visualization, trend analysis, and collaborative features. Built with Firebase for scalable data management.
personalProjects.highlights: Production-ready business intelligence tool with real-time collaboration features

personalProjects.name: Nutrition Tracking Application
personalProjects.description: Web-based nutrition tracking application with Firebase backend for monitoring dietary intake, nutritional analysis, and health metrics. Features responsive design and real-time data synchronization.
personalProjects.highlights: Health-focused application demonstrating Firebase integration and responsive design

personalProjects.name: ChatBot UP
personalProjects.description: Intelligent chatbot application with both frontend and backend implementations. Features natural language processing and API integration for enhanced user interactions.
personalProjects.highlights: Shows AI integration skills and full-stack development capabilities

personalProjects.name: COVID-19 Patterns Analysis (CDMX)
personalProjects.description: Data science project analyzing COVID-19 patterns in Mexico City before vaccination campaigns. Features comprehensive data visualization and statistical analysis using Jupyter notebooks.
personalProjects.highlights: Shows data science skills and ability to extract insights from complex datasets

personalProjects.name: iTunes Search Application v2
personalProjects.description: Modern web application for searching iTunes content with enhanced user interface and improved search functionality. Built with modern JavaScript frameworks and responsive design.
personalProjects.highlights: Demonstrates API integration skills and modern frontend development practices

personalProjects.name: Pascal to C Compiler
personalProjects.description: Academic project implementing a compiler that translates Pascal code to C. Features lexical analysis, syntax parsing, and code generation with comprehensive error handling.
personalProjects.highlights: Demonstrates deep understanding of computer science fundamentals and systems programming

personalProjects.name: TikTok Clone (Flutter)
personalProjects.description: Mobile application clone of TikTok built with Flutter, featuring video playback, user interactions, and modern UI/UX patterns. Showcases cross-platform mobile development expertise.
personalProjects.highlights: Demonstrates mobile development skills and UI/UX design capabilities

professionalProjects.name: Microservices Monitoring Platform (Training Initiative)
professionalProjects.description: Independently developed a modular, containerized monitoring solution for real-time health checks, metrics collection, and alerting. Designed as a comprehensive learning platform to upskill production engineers with no coding background, enabling them to develop automation solutions and reduce dependency on engineering teams.
features: Hands-on training modules for production engineers
professionalProjects.highlights: Educational platform to transition production engineers from non-coding to automation development

professionalProjects.name: Broadcast Automation Platform
professionalProjects.description: Development and maintenance of a modular broadcast automation platform for device control, automation, and real-time media streaming. Includes web UI, backend services, and integration with broadcast devices and protocols.
professionalProjects.highlights: Critical platform for broadcast control and automation software

professionalProjects.name: Audio Patching Automation Server
professionalProjects.description: A high-performance server for programmatically controlling audio patching systems via web interface automation, designed for use with control surfaces. Optimized patch operation time to approximately 1.7 seconds per patch.
professionalProjects.highlights: Automated audio patching workflow with control surface integration

professionalProjects.name: Operational Metrics Automation Platform
professionalProjects.description: Co-developed a Power App and Power BI solution to automate the capture and visualization of operational KPIs across departments. The system replaced manual data entry with a centralized, smart workflow.
professionalProjects.highlights: Automated KPI tracking across multiple departments, reducing manual reporting time

professionalProjects.name: AI-Powered Document Processing Agent
professionalProjects.description: Developed a Copilot agent using Copilot Studio to generate clear, concise, and impactful executive summaries from PDF and Excel files. The agent supports leadership communication by aligning with professional documentation standards.
professionalProjects.highlights: Enabled leadership-ready reporting with adaptive summaries based on document complexity

professionalProjects.name: Enterprise Ticketing and Notification Platform
professionalProjects.description: Developed a Power App to streamline ticket resolution and enhance communication across platforms. The app integrates automated reminders and a centralized notification hub for operational efficiency.
features: Multi-platform alerts (Teams, Email, Slack, Viva Engage)
professionalProjects.highlights: Reduced manual approval time by 60% through automation

professionalProjects.name: Live Sports Broadcast Infrastructure & Production
professionalProjects.description: Designed and deployed broadcast infrastructure for live soccer coverage, including audio interfaces, control systems, and networked equipment. Served as technical producer, coordinating with Premier League production teams and managing communication with commentators and talent in audio booths.
professionalProjects.highlights: Dual role as technical engineer and producer for live sports broadcasts, managing both infrastructure and talent coordination

professionalProjects.name: Enterprise React Applications Suite
professionalProjects.description: Led development of multiple React applications with comprehensive testing coverage, translating complex UI designs into seamless user experiences.
professionalProjects.highlights: Enhanced user engagement through seamless design implementation

professionalProjects.name: University Digital Transformation Project
professionalProjects.description: Led a team of 5 interns in a digital transformation project that was successfully adopted by 3 departments university-wide, showcasing leadership and project management skills.
